belongs_to_collection.name: Raw Collection (Evil Angel & Jules Jordan Video)

overview: Director/ladies' man/hugely hung stud Manuel Ferrara has taken to shooting video footage of his private life dates with lustful, motivated vixens. He releases these long, minimally edited sessions — calling them "scenes" would be a disservice to the genuine, intimate nature of the material — in his "Raw" series. For the double-DVD (nearly six hours!) Raw 6 he has captured four breathtaking encounters that reveal the personalities of the girls and show them as they are behind the scenes — there's no costuming, no lighting crew, no playing to the camera, certainly no script. What's left is a voyeur's dream, what horny girls and amazing sex look like in real, private life.
title: Raw 6
